xwikidoc.content: svn.title=SVN Commit Application svn.description=Welcome to the SVN Commit App. You can configure SVN repositories to connect to your wiki and commit your wiki content in these repositories. svn.currentconfigs.title=Current SVN Configs svn.currentconfigs.noconfigs=There are currently no configs created svn.createnewconfig=Create New SVN Config svn.createnewimport.error.titlemissing=A title is needed when creating an svn config svn.configsheet.title=SVN Repository Configuration svn.configsheet.compare.title=Differences for svn.configsheet.debug=Debug svn.configsheet.commitmessage=Commit Message svn.configsheet.listpages=List pages to commit svn.configsheet.commitall=Commit All svn.configsheet.updateall=Update All svn.configsheet.exportall=Export All svn.configsheet.commit=Commit svn.configsheet.viewdiff=View XML Diff svn.configsheet.viewdocdiff=View Document Diff svn.configsheet.committingpages=Committing the following pages svn.configsheet.committsuccessfull=Commit finished successfully svn.configsheet.commitunsuccessful=An error prevented to perform this commit, please contact your administrator svn.configsheet.repoiniterror=An error prevents the initialization of the repository, please verify your configuration or contact your administrator svn.configsheet.unknownaction=Unknown action svn.configsheet.backtolist=Back to List of pages to commit svn.configsheet.backtocustom=Back to Custom list of pages to commit svn.configsheet.confirmcommittingpage=Please confirm commiting the following page(s) svn.configsheet.custom.spacelist=Space List (separated by commas) svn.configsheet.custom.space=Space svn.configsheet.customlist=Custom List of pages svn.configsheet.pagesupdated=The following pages have been updated from SVN SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_repository=SVN Repository SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_repository_tooltip=svn repository url where to commit the wiki pages SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_username=Username SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_username_tooltip=username to connect to the SVN repository SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_password=Password SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_password_tooltip=password to connect to the SVN repository SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultspace=Default Space List SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultspace_tooltip=space list to check pages to commit in SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_savedlist=Saved List SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_savedlist_tooltip=saved list to check pages to commit in SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultdate=Default date SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultdate_tooltip=Date to set all pages we commit to SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultuser=Default user SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultuser_tooltip=User to set all pages we commit to SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_saveStatus=Save Status SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_defaultspace_tooltip=Status to save on commit SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_prettyXML=Use human readable XML SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_prettyXML_tooltip=Only used with XAR format, the default behavior is to be human readable SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_xarFormat=Format XML SVNCode.SVNConfigClass_xarFormat_tooltip=Format XML like mvn xar:format
